body:
Yes, I also tried putting config there, didn't work. Tried both `config.gpu_options.per_process_gpu_memory_fraction = 0.2` and `config.gpu_options.allow_growth=True`

``` 67         config = tf.ConfigProto()
 68         config.gpu_options.per_process_gpu_memory_fraction = 0.2
 69         server = tf.train.Server(tf_cluster_spec,
 70                                  job_name=job_name,
 71                                  task_index=task_index,
 72                                  config=config)```
